description: A patented, wavelet-based file format designed to enable portability of massive bit-mapped (raster) images.  Used commonly for maps.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">sid</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: MrSID Image Format (Multi-resolution Seamless Image Database), Generation 2
